title: Hello
body:
Hello, this is me doing a blog. It’s going to be about me building a macro studio and attempting to get some good photos out of it. One day perhaps I might get a photo published somewhere in the real world…that’s a sort of semi-idea that depends on a lot of unknowns but it’s nice to have a goal.

I like macro because there are lots of ideas to get your head round and it gives you an excuse to research and obsess over all sorts of weird and wonderful bits of lab equipment on ebay. I’m half way through building a ‘macro-bench’, I’ll upload a photo of it so far in a bit. Meanwhile here’s the first macro I ever did, using an old pentax f1.7, extension tubes, natural light and a single frame. It’s probably still one of the best ones I’ve taken which is slightly unfortunate.
